TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBindingsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection

Docs.summary: コントロールのデータ バインドのコレクションを表します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Simple data binding is accomplished by adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>. Any object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property. For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> contains standard collection methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>.
To get the control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> belongs to, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A> property.
## 例 The following code example adds <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of five controls: four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## 解説 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> のプロパティ、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> のこのオーバー ロードによって作成された、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> 方法の値に設定されて、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> プロパティです。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> イベント、変更が完了したときに発生します。
## 例 次のコード例を作成、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> インスタンス、および使用して、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> にインスタンスを追加する方法、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> の <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> コントロールです。
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## 解説 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> のプロパティ、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> のこのオーバー ロードによって作成された、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> 方法の値に設定されて、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> プロパティです。
追加する、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> により、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> イベントが発生します。
## 例 次のコード例では、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> 3 を追加するメソッドを <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> オブジェクトを <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> の <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> コントロールです。<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> には、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> クラスの <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> プロパティを使用してアクセスします。
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode

Docs.summary: コレクションに含まれる の既定の を取得または設定します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property is used in cases where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> without a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> specified is added to the collection. The default value for Windows Forms controls is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.OnValidation>
## 例
